subject: College Athletics
Football
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Kevin Smith had 284 yards and 4 touchdowns as Central Florida beat Tulsa, 44-25, to win the Conference USA championship. Smith, a junior, is the nation’s leading rusher with 2,448 yards.
snippet: Kevin Smith had 284 yards and 4 touchdowns as Central Florida beat Tulsa, 44-25, to win the Conference USA championship. Smith, a junior, is the nation’s leading rusher with 2,448 yards.
